title: Course Booking Website
description: A full-stack course booking application developed using modern technologies, allowing users to browse and register for various courses with ease.

title: Bakery Website
description: A responsive and feature-rich bakery website created with the MERN stack, showcasing products and enhancing the overall learning experience.

title: E-commerce Website
description: A responsive and scalable e-commerce website developed using the MERN stack, awarded First Prize for its clean design and seamless functionality.

title: Project To-Do List
description: A modern and efficient To-Do List application built using Vite + React, GraphQL, and Apollo Client, styled with TailwindCSS and powered by a Node.js backend.

title: CGVTT - TrainingTrains Certification Portal
description: A full-stack web application built using the MERN stack with MySQL integration for TrainingTrains. It allows users to upload course tasks, request enrollment, and receive verifiable certificates. The platform features certificate generation and validation, a modern UI with React and TailwindCSS, and a secure backend with Node.js and Express.

title: PassNeko - Secure Password Manager
description: PassNeko is a secure password manager built with Next.js and MySQL, designed to store user credentials in an encrypted format using bcrypt and crypto modules. It features user registration and login, password encryption that even the platform canâ€™t decrypt, and a responsive, minimalist UI built with TailwindCSS. With a focus on privacy and simplicity, PassNeko helps users manage their credentials securely and efficiently.
